refrigerate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.
refrigerate.shortDesc: 一般属性招式变为冰属性招式，威力提升20%
refrigerate.name: 冰冻皮肤

protean.desc: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the move it is about to use. This effect comes after all effects that change a move's type.
protean.shortDesc: 自身属性变为即将使用的招式的属性
protean.name: 变幻自如

aerilate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.
aerilate.shortDesc: 一般属性招式变为飞行属性招式，威力提升20%
aerilate.name: 飞行皮肤

merciless.shortDesc: 对方处于中毒或剧毒状态时必定会被击中要害
merciless.name: 不仁不义

cloudnine.shortDesc: 无视场上天气带来的影响
cloudnine.name: 无关天气

colorchange.desc: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the last move that hit it, unless that type is already one of its types. This effect applies after all hits from a multi-hit move; Sheer Force prevents it from activating if the move has a secondary effect.
colorchange.shortDesc: 受到伤害时若招式属性和宝可梦当前属性不同，则宝可梦在伤害结算后变为该属性
colorchange.name: 变色

shieldsdown.desc: If this Pokemon is a Minior, it changes to its Core forme if it has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP at the end of a turn. If Minior's HP is above 1/2 of its maximum HP at the end of a turn, it changes back to Meteor Form.
shieldsdown.shortDesc: If Minior, at end of turn changes forme to Core if at 1/2 max HP or less, else Meteor.
shieldsdown.name: 界限盾壳

persistent.shortDesc: The duration of certain field effects is increased by 2 turns if used by this Pokemon.
persistent.name: Persistent

swarm.name: 虫之预感
swarm.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Bug-type attack.
swarm.shortDesc: HP低于1/3时虫属性招式威力提升50%

marvelscale.desc: If this Pokemon has a major status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.
marvelscale.name: 神奇鳞片

berserk.desc: This Pokemon's Special Attack is raised by 1 stage when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP.
berserk.name: 怒火冲天

bulletproof.desc: This Pokemon is immune to ballistic moves. Ballistic moves include Bullet Seed, Octazooka, Barrage, Rock Wrecker, Zap Cannon, Acid Spray, Aura Sphere, Focus Blast, and all moves with Ball or Bomb in their name.
bulletproof.name: 防弹

galvanize.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.
galvanize.shortDesc: 一般属性招式变为电属性招式，威力提升20%
galvanize.name: 电气皮肤

vitalspirit.shortDesc: 不会陷入睡眠状态，获得状态时恢复睡眠状态
vitalspirit.name: 干劲

cursedbody.desc: If this Pokemon is hit by an attack, there is a 30% chance that move gets disabled unless one of the attacker's moves is already disabled.
cursedbody.shortDesc: 受到伤害时30%概率令对手进入定身法状态
cursedbody.name: 诅咒之躯

torrent.name: 激流
torrent.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Water-type attack.
torrent.shortDesc: HP低于1/3时水属性招式威力提升50%

wonderguard.shortDesc: 只会受到效果绝佳招式的攻击伤害，天气、异常状态、能力阶级及附加效果依然有效
wonderguard.name: 神奇守护

adaptability.desc: This Pokemon's moves that match one of its types have a same-type attack bonus (STAB) of 2 instead of 1.5.
adaptability.shortDesc: This Pokemon's same-type attack bonus (STAB) is 2 instead of 1.5.
adaptability.name: 适应力

disguise.desc: If this Pokemon is a Mimikyu, it will take 0 damage the first time it is attacked in battle. It then changes to Busted Form.
disguise.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is a Mimikyu, it takes 0 damage the first time it is attacked in battle.
disguise.name: 画皮

sandrush.desc: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.
sandrush.shortDesc: 沙暴天气下速度翻倍；免疫沙暴伤害
sandrush.name: 泼沙

anticipation.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted if any opposing Pokemon has an attack that is super effective on this Pokemon, or an OHKO move. Counter, Metal Burst, and Mirror Coat count as attacking moves of their respective types, while Hidden Power, Judgment, Natural Gift, Techno Blast, and Weather Ball are considered Normal-type moves.
anticipation.shortDesc: 登场时可以预知对方的效果绝佳和一击必杀招式
anticipation.name: 危险预知

parentalbond.desc: This Pokemon's damaging moves become multi-hit moves that hit twice. The second hit has its damage quartered. Does not affect multi-hit moves or moves that have multiple targets.
parentalbond.shortDesc: 攻击两次；第二次攻击伤害变为第一次的1/4
parentalbond.name: 亲子爱

overcoat.shortDesc: 免疫沙暴和冰雹天气带来的影响，对粉末类招式免疫
overcoat.name: 防尘

icebody.desc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. This Pokemon takes no damage from Hail.
icebody.shortDesc: 冰雹天气下每回合回复最大HP的1/16，免疫冰雹伤害
icebody.name: 冰冻之躯

intimidate.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of adjacent opposing Pokemon by 1 stage. Pokemon behind a substitute are immune.
intimidate.shortDesc: 登场时对方攻击降低一级
intimidate.name: 威吓

frisk.shortDesc: 登场时可以预知对方所有宝可梦的道具
frisk.name: 察觉

roughskin.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down.
roughskin.shortDesc: 受到接触伤害时对方损失最大HP的1/8
roughskin.name: 粗糙皮肤

healer.desc: There is a 30% chance of curing an adjacent ally's major status condition at the end of each turn.
healer.shortDesc: 回合结束时30%概率回复队友的异常状态
healer.name: 治愈之心

telepathy.shortDesc: 不会受到队友招式的伤害
telepathy.name: 心灵感应

prismarmor.shortDesc: 受到效果绝佳伤害时伤害降低25%
prismarmor.name: 棱镜装甲

quickfeet.desc: If this Pokemon has a major status condition, its Speed is multiplied by 1.5; the Speed drop from paralysis is ignored.
quickfeet.shortDesc: 异常状态下速度增加50%，无视麻痹带来的速度降低影响
quickfeet.name: 飞毛腿

plus.desc: If an active ally has this Ability or the Ability Minus, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.
plus.shortDesc: 队友特性为正极或负极时特攻提升50%
plus.name: 正电

arenatrap.desc: Prevents adjacent opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are immune to trapping or are airborne.
arenatrap.shortDesc: 处于地面上的对方宝可梦进入无法逃走状态
arenatrap.name: 沙穴

hustle.name: 活力
hustle.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and the accuracy of its physical attacks is multiplied by 0.8.
hustle.shortDesc: 以物理招式的命中率降低20%为代价提升50%攻击

powerofalchemy.desc: This Pokemon copies the Ability of an ally that faints. Abilities that cannot be copied are Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, and Zen Mode.
powerofalchemy.shortDesc: 同伴被击倒后自身特性变为与之相同
powerofalchemy.name: 化学之力

prankster.shortDesc: 变化招式的优先度+1，但对恶属性宝可梦无效
prankster.name: 恶作剧之心

flareboost.desc: While this Pokemon is burned, the power of its special attacks is multiplied by 1.5.
flareboost.shortDesc: 陷入灼伤状态时特攻提升50%
flareboost.name: 受热激升

hydration.desc: This Pokemon has its major status condition cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active.
hydration.shortDesc: 下雨和大雨天气下回合结束时恢复异常状态
hydration.name: 湿润之躯

tangledfeet.shortDesc: 混乱状态下闪避率翻倍
tangledfeet.name: 蹒跚

flowergift.name: 花之礼
flowergift.desc: If this Pokemon is a Cherrim and Sunny Day is active, it changes to Sunshine Form and the Attack and Special Defense of it and its allies are multiplied by 1.5.
flowergift.shortDesc: 在大晴天和大日照天气时己方所有宝可梦攻击和特防提升50%，樱花儿的形态会改变

sheerforce.desc: This Pokemon's attacks with secondary effects have their power multiplied by 1.3, but the secondary effects are removed.
sheerforce.shortDesc: 以无视招式的追加效果为代价，带有追加效果的招式的威力提升33%
sheerforce.name: 强行

poisonheal.desc: If this Pokemon is poisoned, it restores 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn instead of losing HP.
poisonheal.shortDesc: 处于中毒或剧毒状态时不会损失HP，每回合回复最大HP的1/8
poisonheal.name: 毒疗

watercompaction.shortDesc: 受到水属性招式攻击时防御提升两级
watercompaction.name: 遇水凝固

dryskin.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move. The power of Fire-type moves is multiplied by 1.25 when used on this Pokemon. At the end of each turn, this Pokemon restores 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, if the weather is Rain Dance, and loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, if the weather is Sunny Day.
dryskin.shortDesc: 免疫水属性招式伤害，受到水属性招式攻击时回复最大HP的1/4；下雨天气下每回合回复最大HP的1/8；受到火属性招式伤害增加25%；大晴天天气下每回合损失最大HP的1/8
dryskin.name: 干燥皮肤

innardsout.desc: If this Pokemon is knocked out with a move, that move's user loses HP equal to the amount of damage inflicted on this Pokemon.
innardsout.shortDesc: 被击倒时对方损失同样数量的HP
innardsout.name: 飞出的内在物

stickyhold.shortDesc: 不会因对方招式失去携带的道具
stickyhold.name: 黏着

unnerve.shortDesc: 对方宝可梦不可使用树果
unnerve.name: 紧张感

scrappy.shortDesc: 一般和斗属性招式可以攻击到鬼属性宝可梦
scrappy.name: 胆量

runaway.shortDesc: 没有什么可比较性的用处。
runaway.name: 逃跑

speedboost.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage at the end of each full turn it has been on the field.
speedboost.shortDesc: 回合结束时速度提升一级
speedboost.name: 加速

unburden.desc: If this Pokemon loses its held item for any reason, its Speed is doubled. This boost is lost if it switches out or gains a new item or Ability.
unburden.shortDesc: 失去道具时速度翻倍，退场或获得新道具后复原
unburden.name: 轻装

drought.shortDesc: 登场时天气变为大晴天
drought.name: 日照

klutz.desc: This Pokemon's held item has no effect. This Pokemon cannot use Fling successfully. Macho Brace, Power Anklet, Power Band, Power Belt, Power Bracer, Power Lens, and Power Weight still have their effects.
klutz.shortDesc: 携带的道具无效，超级石、Z纯晶和影响基础点数、经验值和亲密度的携带物品除外；无法使用投掷
klutz.name: 笨拙

sweetveil.shortDesc: 己方所有宝可梦不会陷入睡眠状态
sweetveil.name: 甜幕

truant.shortDesc: 使用招式之后，下一回合不能使用招式
truant.name: 懒惰

shadowshield.shortDesc: HP全满时受到的伤害减半
shadowshield.name: 幻影防守

mountaineer.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon avoids all Rock-type attacks and Stealth Rock.
mountaineer.name: Mountaineer

flamebody.shortDesc: 受到接触类伤害时30%概率陷入灼伤状态
flamebody.name: 火焰之躯

flowerveil.desc: Grass-type Pokemon on this Pokemon's side cannot have their stat stages lowered by other Pokemon or have a major status condition inflicted on them by other Pokemon.
flowerveil.shortDesc: 己方所有宝可梦草属性能力阶级不会被降低且不会进入异常状态
flowerveil.name: 花幕

skilllink.shortDesc: 使用攻击次数浮动在2~5次之间的连续招式时，攻击次数会固定在五次
skilllink.name: 连续攻击

voltabsorb.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by an Electric-type move.
voltabsorb.shortDesc: 受到电属性招式攻击时回复最大HP的1/4；免疫电属性伤害
voltabsorb.name: 蓄电

pressure.desc: If this Pokemon is the target of an opposing Pokemon's move, that move loses one additional PP.
pressure.shortDesc: 对方以自身为目标的招式额外消耗1PP
pressure.name: 压迫感

zenmode.desc: If this Pokemon is a Darmanitan, it changes to Zen Mode if it has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP at the end of a turn. If Darmanitan's HP is above 1/2 of its maximum HP at the end of a turn, it changes back to Standard Mode. If Darmanitan loses this Ability while in Zen Mode it reverts to Standard Mode immediately.
zenmode.shortDesc: HP不足一半时转变为达摩形态
zenmode.name: 达摩模式

cutecharm.desc: There is a 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will become infatuated if it is of the opposite gender.
cutecharm.shortDesc: 受到接触类伤害时30%概率令对手进入着迷状态
cutecharm.name: 迷人之躯

download.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack or Special Attack is raised by 1 stage based on the weaker combined defensive stat of all opposing Pokemon. Attack is raised if their Defense is lower, and Special Attack is raised if their Special Defense is the same or lower.
download.shortDesc: 登场时，对手防御小于特防时，自身攻击提升一级；否则特攻提升一级
download.name: 下载

aromaveil.desc: This Pokemon and its allies cannot be affected by Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, or Torment.
aromaveil.shortDesc: 己方宝可梦不会受到迷人，定身法，再来一次，回复封锁，挑衅和无理取闹的影响
aromaveil.name: 芳香幕

magicguard.desc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by direct attacks. Curse and Substitute on use, Belly Drum, Pain Split, Struggle recoil, and confusion damage are considered direct damage.
magicguard.shortDesc: 免疫除攻击招式以外的一切造成的伤害
magicguard.name: 魔法防守

waterveil.shortDesc: 不会陷入灼伤状态，获得特性时恢复灼伤状态
waterveil.name: 水幕

victorystar.shortDesc: 己方所有宝可梦命中率提升10%
victorystar.name: 胜利之星

rattled.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage if hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type attack.
rattled.shortDesc: 受到虫/恶/鬼属性招式攻击后速度提升一级
rattled.name: 胆怯

overgrow.name: 茂盛
overgrow.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Grass-type attack.
overgrow.shortDesc: HP低于1/3时，草属性招式威力增加50%

beastboost.desc: This Pokemon's highest stat is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and knocks out another Pokemon.
beastboost.shortDesc: 击倒对方一只PM之后最高一项能力提升一级
beastboost.name: 异兽提升

mummy.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability changed to Mummy. Does not affect the Abilities Multitype or Stance Change.
mummy.shortDesc: 受到接触类伤害时对方特性变为木乃伊
mummy.name: 木乃伊

deltastream.desc: On switch-in, the weather becomes strong winds that remove the weaknesses of the Flying type from Flying-type Pokemon. This weather remains in effect until this Ability is no longer active for any Pokemon, or the weather is changed by Desolate Land or Primordial Sea.
deltastream.shortDesc: 登场时天气变为乱流，直到该宝可梦离场，除非天气被终结之地和始源之海更改
deltastream.name: 德尔塔气流

desolateland.desc: On switch-in, the weather becomes extremely harsh sunlight that prevents damaging Water-type moves from executing, in addition to all the effects of Sunny Day. This weather remains in effect until this Ability is no longer active for any Pokemon, or the weather is changed by Delta Stream or Primordial Sea.
desolateland.shortDesc: 登场时天气变为大日照，直到该宝可梦离场，除非天气被德尔塔气流和始源之海更改
desolateland.name: 终结之地

powerconstruct.desc: If this Pokemon is a Zygarde in its 10% or 50% Forme, it changes to Complete Forme when it has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP at the end of the turn.
powerconstruct.shortDesc: 基格尔德10%形态或50%的HP低于50%时在回合结束会变为完全体形态
powerconstruct.name: 群聚变形

multiscale.shortDesc: HP全满时受到的伤害减半
multiscale.name: 多重鳞片

sandforce.desc: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Ground-, Rock-, and Steel-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.3. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.
sandforce.shortDesc: 沙暴天气下地面/岩石/钢属性招式威力提升30%；免疫沙暴伤害
sandforce.name: 沙之力

harvest.desc: If the last item this Pokemon used is a Berry, there is a 50% chance it gets restored at the end of each turn. If Sunny Day is active, this chance is 100%.
harvest.shortDesc: 使用树果后每回合50%概率回收该树果，大晴天和大日照天气下则必定回收
harvest.name: 收获

rebound.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon blocks certain status moves and instead uses the move against the original user.
rebound.shortDesc: On switch-in, blocks certain status moves and bounces them back to the user.
rebound.name: Rebound

receiver.desc: This Pokemon copies the Ability of an ally that faints. Abilities that cannot be copied are Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, and Zen Mode.
receiver.shortDesc: 同伴被击倒后自身特性变为与之相同
receiver.name: 接球手

angerpoint.desc: If this Pokemon, but not its substitute, is struck by a critical hit, its Attack is raised by 12 stages.
angerpoint.shortDesc: 被击中要害的话攻击提出十二级，替身状态下不会发动
angerpoint.name: 愤怒穴位

darkaura.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the power of Dark-type moves used by active Pokemon is multiplied by 1.33.
darkaura.shortDesc: 场上所有恶属性招式威力提升33%
darkaura.name: 暗黑气场

liquidooze.shortDesc: 受到吸取HP的招式伤害时，对方本应吸取的体力会转为受到同等的伤害
liquidooze.name: 污泥浆

ironfist.desc: This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.
ironfist.name: 铁拳

naturalcure.shortDesc: 退场时恢复自身的异常状态
naturalcure.name: 自然回复

toxicboost.desc: While this Pokemon is poisoned, the power of its physical attacks is multiplied by 1.5.
toxicboost.shortDesc: 中毒和剧毒状态下物理招式威力提升50%
toxicboost.name: 中毒激升

snowcloak.desc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is multiplied by 1.25. This Pokemon takes no damage from Hail.
snowcloak.shortDesc: 冰雹天气下闪避率增加25%；免疫冰雹伤害
snowcloak.name: 雪隐

flashfire.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Fire-type moves. The first time it is hit by a Fire-type move, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Fire-type attack as long as it remains active and has this Ability. If this Pokemon is frozen, it cannot be defrosted by Fire-type attacks.
flashfire.shortDesc: 免疫火属性招式伤害，受到火属性招式攻击时火属性招式威力提升50%
flashfire.name: 引火

blaze.name: 猛火
blaze.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Fire-type attack.
blaze.shortDesc: HP低于1/3时火属性招式威力提升50%

slushrush.desc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled. This Pokemon takes no damage from Hail.
slushrush.shortDesc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled; immunity to Hail.
slushrush.name: 拨雪

earlybird.shortDesc: 睡眠异常状态的持续回合舍入为原来的一半
earlybird.name: 早起

stakeout.shortDesc: 对替换出场的宝可梦伤害翻倍
stakeout.name: 监视

synchronize.desc: If another Pokemon burns, paralyzes, poisons, or badly poisons this Pokemon, that Pokemon receives the same major status condition.
synchronize.shortDesc: 如果因对手招式而陷入灼伤/中毒/麻痹状态，对方也同样陷入同样的状态
synchronize.name: 同步

moxie.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and knocks out another Pokemon.
moxie.shortDesc: 每击倒对方一只宝可梦攻击提升一级
moxie.name: 自信过度

pickup.shortDesc: 回合结束时，若没有携带道具则获得本回合其他宝可梦使用或投掷过的道具
pickup.name: 捡拾

tintedlens.shortDesc: 造成的效果不理想的伤害翻倍
tintedlens.name: 有色眼镜

longreach.shortDesc: 所有招式均视为非接触类招式
longreach.name: 远隔

pixilate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.
pixilate.shortDesc: 一般属性招式变为妖精属性招式，威力提升20%
pixilate.name: 妖精皮肤

limber.shortDesc: 不会陷入麻痹状态，获得状态时恢复麻痹状态
limber.name: 柔软

keeneye.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's accuracy stat stage. This Pokemon ignores a target's evasiveness stat stage.
keeneye.shortDesc: 命中率不会被下降，无视对方闪避等级
keeneye.name: 锐利目光

symbiosis.desc: If an ally uses its item, this Pokemon gives its item to that ally immediately. Does not activate if the ally's item was stolen or knocked off.
symbiosis.shortDesc: 使用道具后会立即将道具交给没有道具的队友
symbiosis.name: 共生

oblivious.desc: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or taunted. Gaining this Ability while affected cures it.
oblivious.shortDesc: 不会陷入着迷和挑衅状态
oblivious.name: 迟钝

stall.shortDesc: 优先度相同时必定后出
stall.name: 慢出

magicbounce.desc: This Pokemon blocks certain status moves and instead uses the move against the original user.
magicbounce.shortDesc: 将对方以自身为目标的部分招式无效化并反弹给招式的使用者
magicbounce.name: 魔法镜

trace.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent opposing Pokemon's Ability. If there is no Ability that can be copied at that time, this Ability will activate as soon as an Ability can be copied. Abilities that cannot be copied are Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Stance Change, Trace, and Zen Mode.
trace.shortDesc: 登场时复制一个随机对手的特性
trace.name: 复制

sapsipper.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Grass-type moves and raises its Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Grass-type move.
sapsipper.shortDesc: 受到草属性招式攻击时攻击提升一级；免疫草属性招式伤害
sapsipper.name: 食草

magnetpull.desc: Prevents adjacent opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are immune to trapping.
magnetpull.shortDesc: 对方的钢属性宝可梦不能交换
magnetpull.name: 磁力

sturdy.desc: If this Pokemon is at full HP, it survives one hit with at least 1 HP. OHKO moves fail when used against this Pokemon.
sturdy.shortDesc: HP全满时受到致命伤害会保留1HP；免疫一击必杀招式
sturdy.name: 结实

immunity.shortDesc: 不会陷入中毒和剧毒状态，获得状态时恢复中毒和剧毒状态
immunity.name: 免疫

baddreams.desc: Causes adjacent opposing Pokemon to lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn if they are asleep.
baddreams.shortDesc: 回合结束时对方处于睡眠状态的宝可梦损失最大HP的1/8
baddreams.name: 梦魇

battlebond.desc: If this Pokemon is a Greninja, it transforms into Ash-Greninja after knocking out a Pokemon. As Ash-Greninja, its Water Shuriken has 20 base power and always hits 3 times.
battlebond.shortDesc: After knocking out Pokemon: Adopt Ash forme, Water Shuriken hits 3 times with 20 BP.
battlebond.name: 牵绊变身

slowstart.shortDesc: 登场之后的五回合内攻击和速度减半
slowstart.name: 慢启动

megalauncher.desc: This Pokemon's pulse moves have their power multiplied by 1.5. Heal Pulse restores 3/4 of a target's maximum HP, rounded half down.
megalauncher.shortDesc: 波动类和波导类招式威力提升50%，治愈波动回复量上升为最大HP的3/4
megalauncher.name: 超级发射器

poisontouch.shortDesc: 接触类招式造成伤害时30%令对手陷入中毒状态
poisontouch.name: 毒手

strongjaw.desc: This Pokemon's bite-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.
strongjaw.shortDesc: 啃咬类招式威力提升50%，虫咬除外
strongjaw.name: 强壮之颚

soulheart.desc: This Pokemon's Special Attack is raised by 1 stage when another Pokemon faints.
soulheart.shortDesc: 击倒对手时特攻提升一级
soulheart.name: 魂心

airlock.shortDesc: 无视场上天气带来的影响
airlock.name: 气闸

galewings.shortDesc: HP全满时飞行属性招式优先度+1
galewings.name: 疾风之翼

dancer.desc: After another Pokemon uses a dance move, this Pokemon uses the same move. Moves used by this Ability cannot be copied again.
dancer.shortDesc: 有其他宝可梦使用跳舞招式时，立即使用相同的招式
dancer.name: 舞者

wonderskin.shortDesc: 变化招式对该特性的宝可梦命中率减半
wonderskin.desc: All non-damaging moves that check accuracy have their accuracy changed to 50% when used on this Pokemon. This change is done before any other accuracy modifying effects.
wonderskin.name: 奇迹皮肤

schooling.desc: On switch-in, if this Pokemon is a Wishiwashi that is level 20 or above and has more than 1/4 of its maximum HP left, it changes to School Form. If it is in School Form and its HP drops to 1/4 of its maximum HP or less, it changes to Solo Form at the end of the turn. If it is in Solo Form and its HP is greater than 1/4 its maximum HP at the end of the turn, it changes to School Form.
schooling.shortDesc: 弱丁鱼的HP高于1/4时变为鱼群的样子，否则变为单独的样子
schooling.name: 鱼群

insomnia.shortDesc: 不会陷入睡眠状态，获得状态时恢复睡眠状态
insomnia.name: 不眠

shadowtag.desc: Prevents adjacent opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are immune to trapping or also have this Ability.
shadowtag.shortDesc: 除非对方拥有同样的特性，否则不能替换宝可梦
shadowtag.name: 踩影

forecast.desc: If this Pokemon is a Castform, its type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.
forecast.shortDesc: 漂浮泡泡的形态和属性根据天气而变化
forecast.name: 阴晴不定

forewarn.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the move with the highest power, at random, known by an opposing Pokemon.
forewarn.shortDesc: 登场时可以预知对方威力最高的招式
forewarn.name: 预知梦

unaware.desc: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's Attack, Special Attack, and accuracy stat stages when taking damage, and ignores other Pokemon's Defense, Special Defense, and evasiveness stat stages when dealing damage.
unaware.shortDesc: 使用或受到招式造成伤害时无视对方的能力阶级变化
unaware.name: 纯朴

effectspore.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned, paralyzed, or fall asleep.
effectspore.shortDesc: 受到接触类伤害时30%概率令对手陷入中毒/麻痹/睡眠状态
effectspore.name: 孢子

solidrock.shortDesc: 受到效果绝佳伤害时伤害降低25%
solidrock.name: 坚硬岩石

magician.desc: If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon it hits with an attack. Does not affect Doom Desire and Future Sight.
magician.shortDesc: 造成伤害时，如果没有携带道具则获得对方道具
magician.name: 魔术师

damp.desc: While this Pokemon is active, Self-Destruct, Explosion, and the Ability Aftermath are prevented from having an effect.
damp.shortDesc: 场上的所有自爆、大爆炸和引爆特性无效
damp.name: 湿气

battery.shortDesc: 我方场上所有宝可梦使用特殊招式的威力增加30%
battery.name: 蓄电池

defeatist.name: 软弱
defeatist.desc: While this Pokemon has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, its Attack and Special Attack are halved.
defeatist.shortDesc: HP低于50%时攻击和特攻减半

weakarmor.desc: If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, its Defense is lowered by 1 stage and its Speed is raised by 2 stages.
weakarmor.shortDesc: 受到物理招式伤害时防御降低一级，同时速度提升两级
weakarmor.name: 碎裂铠甲

rivalry.desc: This Pokemon's attacks have their power multiplied by 1.25 against targets of the same gender or multiplied by 0.75 against targets of the opposite gender. There is no modifier if either this Pokemon or the target is genderless.
rivalry.shortDesc: 对手与自身性别相同时威力提升25%，性别不同时下降25%
rivalry.name: 斗争心

defiant.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 2 stages for each of its stat stages that is lowered by an opposing Pokemon.
defiant.shortDesc: 能力阶级被降低时攻击提升两级
defiant.name: 不服输

liquidvoice.desc: This Pokemon's sound-based moves become Water-type moves. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.
liquidvoice.shortDesc: 声音的招式属性均变为水属性
liquidvoice.name: 湿润之声

levitate.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Ground. Gravity, Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball nullify the immunity.
levitate.shortDesc: 免疫地面属性伤害，但受到重力、扎根、击落和黑色铁球影响时仍会受到伤害
levitate.name: 飘浮

primordialsea.desc: On switch-in, the weather becomes heavy rain that prevents damaging Fire-type moves from executing, in addition to all the effects of Rain Dance. This weather remains in effect until this Ability is no longer active for any Pokemon, or the weather is changed by Delta Stream or Desolate Land.
primordialsea.shortDesc: 登场时天气变为大雨，直到该宝可梦离场，除非天气被德尔塔气流和终结之地更改
primordialsea.name: 始源之海

leafguard.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot gain a major status condition and Rest will fail for it.
leafguard.shortDesc: 大晴天和大日照天气下不会陷入异常状态，使用睡觉会无效
leafguard.name: 叶子防守

lightningrod.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and raises its Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move. If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Electric-type move used by another Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself if it is within the range of that move.
lightningrod.shortDesc: 自动成为对方电属性招式的攻击目标并提升一级特攻；免疫电属性攻击
lightningrod.name: 避雷针

aftermath.desc: If this Pokemon is knocked out with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down. If any active Pokemon has the Ability Damp, this effect is prevented.
aftermath.shortDesc: 因接触类招式被击倒时，对方宝可梦损失最大HP的1/4
aftermath.name: 引爆

reckless.desc: This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have their power multiplied by 1.2. Does not affect Struggle.
reckless.shortDesc: 使用具有反作用力伤害的招式时威力提升20%，挣扎除外
reckless.name: 舍身

thickfat.name: 厚脂肪
thickfat.desc: If a Pokemon uses a Fire- or Ice-type attack against this Pokemon, that Pokemon's attacking stat is halved when calculating the damage to this Pokemon.
thickfat.shortDesc: 受到火属性和冰属性招式造成的伤害减半

gluttony.shortDesc: HP低于50%时会提前使用特定的树果
gluttony.name: 贪吃鬼

illusion.desc: When this Pokemon switches in, it appears as the last unfainted Pokemon in its party until it takes direct damage from another Pokemon's attack. This Pokemon's actual level and HP are displayed instead of those of the mimicked Pokemon.
illusion.shortDesc: 受到伤害前始终显示为队伍中最后一个宝可梦的形象
illusion.name: 幻觉

competitive.desc: This Pokemon's Special Attack is raised by 2 stages for each of its stat stages that is lowered by an opposing Pokemon.
competitive.shortDesc: 能力阶级被降低时特攻提升两级
competitive.name: 好胜

ironbarbs.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down.
ironbarbs.shortDesc: 受到接触伤害时对方损失最大HP的1/8
ironbarbs.name: 铁刺

noguard.shortDesc: 自身使用和以自身为目标的招式必定命中
noguard.name: 无防守

rkssystem.shortDesc: 银伴战兽的属性随着它携带的存储碟改变
rkssystem.name: ＡＲ系统

comatose.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be statused. Gaining this Ability while statused cures it.
comatose.name: 绝对睡眠

waterbubble.desc: This Pokemon's Water-type attacks have their power doubled, the power of Fire-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved, and this Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.
waterbubble.shortDesc: 水属性招式威力翻倍；不会陷入灼伤状态；受到的火属性招式伤害减半
waterbubble.name: 水泡

aurabreak.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of the Abilities Dark Aura and Fairy Aura are reversed, multiplying the power of Dark- and Fairy-type moves, respectively, by 3/4 instead of 1.33.
aurabreak.shortDesc: 反转气场类特性，令其对恶属性和妖精属性的加成变为降低25%
aurabreak.name: 气场破坏

stancechange.desc: If this Pokemon is an Aegislash, it changes to Blade Forme before attempting to use an attacking move, and changes to Shield Forme before attempting to use King's Shield.
stancechange.shortDesc: 坚盾剑怪使用攻击招式时会变为刀剑形态，使用王者盾牌时变为盾牌形态
stancechange.name: 战斗切换

filter.shortDesc: 受到效果绝佳伤害时伤害降低25%
filter.name: 过滤

fairyaura.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the power of Fairy-type moves used by active Pokemon is multiplied by 1.33.
fairyaura.shortDesc: 场上所有妖精属性招式威力提升33%
fairyaura.name: 妖精气场

magmaarmor.shortDesc: 不会陷入冰冻状态，获得特性时恢复冰冻状态
magmaarmor.name: 熔岩铠甲

friendguard.shortDesc: 己方其他宝可梦受到的伤害降低25%
friendguard.name: 友情防守

stormdrain.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and raises its Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Water-type move. If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Water-type move used by another Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself if it is within the range of that move.
stormdrain.shortDesc: 自动成为对方水属性招式的攻击目标并提升一级特攻；免疫电属性攻击
stormdrain.name: 引水

cheekpouch.desc: If this Pokemon eats a Berry, it restores 1/3 of its maximum HP, rounded down, in addition to the Berry's effect.
cheekpouch.shortDesc: 食用树果触发效果之后额外回复最大HP的1/3
cheekpouch.name: 颊囊

queenlymajesty.desc: While this Pokemon is active, priority moves from opposing Pokemon targeted at allies are prevented from having an effect.
queenlymajesty.shortDesc: 对方的可以影响到自己或己方宝可梦的先制招式无效
queenlymajesty.name: 女王的威严

poisonpoint.shortDesc: 受到接触类伤害时30%令对手陷入中毒状态
poisonpoint.name: 毒刺

moody.desc: This Pokemon has a random stat raised by 2 stages and another stat lowered by 1 stage at the end of each turn.
moody.shortDesc: 每回合结束时随机降低一项能力等级并提升两项能力等级
moody.name: 心情不定

rockhead.desc: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle, Life Orb, and crash damage.
rockhead.shortDesc: 不会受到自身招式的反作用力伤害，挣扎、飞踢和飞漆踢除外；生命宝珠的副作用不受影响
rockhead.name: 坚硬脑袋

justified.shortDesc: 受到恶属性招式攻击时攻击提升一级
justified.name: 正义之心

normalize.desc: This Pokemon's moves are changed to be Normal type and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes before other effects that change a move's type.
normalize.shortDesc: 全部招式变为一般属性招式，威力提升20%
normalize.name: 一般皮肤

multitype.shortDesc: 阿尔宙斯的属性随着它携带的石板或Z纯晶改变
multitype.name: 多属性

raindish.desc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.
raindish.shortDesc: 下雨天气下每回合回复最大HP的1/16
raindish.name: 雨盘

owntempo.shortDesc: 不会陷入混乱状态，获得特性时恢复状态
owntempo.name: 我行我素

infiltrator.desc: This Pokemon's moves ignore substitutes and the opposing side's Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, and Mist.
infiltrator.shortDesc: Moves ignore substitutes and opposing Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, and Mist.
infiltrator.name: 穿透

sniper.shortDesc: 击中要害的招式伤害增加50%
sniper.name: 狙击手

waterabsorb.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move.
waterabsorb.shortDesc: 受到水属性招式攻击时回复最大HP的1/4；免疫水属性伤害
waterabsorb.name: 储水

solarpower.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and it loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.
solarpower.shortDesc: 大晴天天气下特攻增加50%；大晴天天气下回合结束时损失最大HP的1/8
solarpower.name: 太阳之力

shielddust.shortDesc: 受到攻击时对方招式的追加效果不会发动
shielddust.name: 鳞粉

honeygather.shortDesc: 没有什么可比较性的用处。
honeygather.name: 集蜜

serenegrace.shortDesc: 招式的追加效果出现率翻倍
serenegrace.name: 天恩

stamina.shortDesc: 受到伤害后防御提升一级
stamina.name: 持久力

contrary.shortDesc: 能力阶级的下降变为上升，上升变为下降
contrary.name: 唱反调

shedskin.desc: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its major status condition cured at the end of each turn.
shedskin.shortDesc: 回合结束时33%恢复异常状态
shedskin.name: 蜕皮

static.shortDesc: 受到接触伤害时对方30%陷入麻痹状态
static.name: 静电

imposter.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon Transforms into the opposing Pokemon that is facing it. If there is no Pokemon at that position, this Pokemon does not Transform.
imposter.shortDesc: 登场时以对应对手为目标进入变身状态
imposter.name: 变身者

tanglinghair.shortDesc: 受到接触伤害时对方速度降低一级
tanglinghair.name: 卷发

illuminate.shortDesc: 没有什么可比较性的用处。
illuminate.name: 发光

superluck.shortDesc: 击中要害等级提升一级
superluck.name: 超幸运

pickpocket.desc: If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon that makes contact with it. This effect applies after all hits from a multi-hit move; Sheer Force prevents it from activating if the move has a secondary effect.
pickpocket.shortDesc: 受到接触伤害时，若没有携带道具则获得对方道具
pickpocket.name: 顺手牵羊

gooey.shortDesc: 受到接触伤害时对方速度降低一级
gooey.name: 黏滑

dazzling.desc: While this Pokemon is active, priority moves from opposing Pokemon targeted at allies are prevented from having an effect.
dazzling.shortDesc: 对方的可以影响到自己或己方宝可梦的先制招式无效
dazzling.name: 鲜艳之躯

neuroforce.desc: Increases the power of Super Effective moves used by this Pok茅mon by 20%
neuroforce.shortDesc: Super effective moves used by this Pokemon will do 1.2x damage.
neuroforce.name: 脑核之力

technician.desc: This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have their power multiplied by 1.5. Does affect Struggle.
technician.shortDesc: 使用威力低于60的招式时威力增加50%，挣扎除外
technician.name: 技术高手

motordrive.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and raises its Speed by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move.
motordrive.shortDesc: 受到电属性招式攻击时速度提升一级；免疫电属性招式伤害
motordrive.name: 电气引擎

analytic.desc: The power of this Pokemon's move is multiplied by 1.3 if it is the last to move in a turn. Does not affect Doom Desire and Future Sight.
analytic.shortDesc: 回合最后行动的话威力提升30%
analytic.name: 分析

fluffy.desc: This Pokemon receives 1/2 damage from contact moves, but double damage from Fire moves.
fluffy.shortDesc: 受到的接触类伤害减半，受到火属性招式伤害翻倍
fluffy.name: 毛茸茸

guts.name: 毅力
guts.desc: If this Pokemon has a major status condition, its Attack is multiplied by 1.5; burn's physical damage halving is ignored.
guts.shortDesc: 陷入异常状态时攻击提升50%，无视灼伤状态减半物理招式伤害效果

stench.shortDesc: 不会造成畏缩的招式造成伤害时10%造成对方畏缩
stench.name: 恶臭

corrosion.shortDesc: 无论对方属性都可以进入中毒或剧毒状态
corrosion.name: 腐蚀

minus.desc: If an active ally has this Ability or the Ability Plus, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.
minus.shortDesc: 队友特性为正极或负极时特攻提升50%
minus.name: 负电

sandveil.desc: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is multiplied by 1.25. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.
sandveil.shortDesc: 沙暴天气下闪避率增加25%；免疫沙暴伤害
sandveil.name: 沙隐

heatproof.desc: The power of Fire-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved, and burn damage taken is halved.
heatproof.shortDesc: 火属性招式和灼伤伤害减半
heatproof.name: 耐热
